com.golden.gamedev.engine.graphics
Class WindowExitListener

java.lang.Object
  com.golden.gamedev.engine.graphics.WindowExitListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
WindowListener, EventListener
public final class WindowExitListener
extends Object
implements WindowListener

WindowExitListener class is a dummy window listener class that that forcing Java Virtual Machine to quit by calling System.exit().

This window listener is used by all java.awt.Frame class in this graphics engine package.

Method Summary

          Returns WindowExitListener singleton instance.
